org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class YahooClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableWebObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<OAuthCredentials,U>
          • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuthClient<U>
            • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuth10Client<YahooProfile>
              • org.pac4j.oauth.client.YahooClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<OAuthCredentials,YahooProfile>

    public class YahooClient
extends BaseOAuth10Client<YahooProfile>

    This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Yahoo.

    It returns a YahooProfile.

    More information at http://developer.yahoo.com/social/rest_api_guide/extended-profile-resource.html

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
    See Also:
    YahooProfile
